analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, aññaṁ ekanīvaraṇampi samanupassāmi yena nīvaraṇena nivutā pajā dīgharattaṁ sandhāvanti saṁsaranti yathayidaṁ, bhikkhave, avijjānīvaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: na aha bhikkhave aññam eka nīvaraṇam pi samanupassāmi yena nīvaraṇena nivutāḥ pajāḥ dīgharattam sandhāvanti sasaranti bhikkhave

original: Avijjānīvaraṇena hi, bhikkhave, nivutā pajā dīgharattaṁ sandhāvanti saṁsarantī”ti.
analyzed: avijjā nīvaraṇena hi bhikkhave nivutāḥ pajāḥ dīgharattam sandhāvanti sasaranti iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
